metadata.Title: CVE-2021-21288 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Compliant (bionic) - medium
metadata.Description: CarrierWave is an open-source RubyGem which provides a simple and flexibleway to upload files from Ruby applications. In CarrierWave before versions1.3.2 and 2.1.1 the download feature has an SSRF vulnerability, allowingattacks to provide DNS entries or IP addresses that are intended forinternal use and gather information about the Intranet infrastructure ofthe platform. This is fixed in versions 1.3.2 and 2.1.1.

criterions.comment: ruby-carrierwave: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
